content.short: The leading decentralized crypto trading protocol. Swap, earn, and build on the Uniswap Protocol.
content.description: Uniswap is a decentralized finance protocol that is used to exchange cryptocurrencies. Uniswap is also the name of the company that initially built the Uniswap protocol. The protocol facilitates automated transactions between cryptocurrency tokens on the Ethereum blockchain through the use of smart contracts.
content.meta: Trade and earn with Uniswap, the leading decentralized crypto trading protocol on Ethereum and other blockchains.
content.pageTitle: Uniswap: The Leading Decentralized Crypto Trading Protocol
